author: marvin
msg: Stop relying on inherited CSS for "content" div.

author: marvin
msg: Django blocks are for template inheritance, so that a child template can
override the block and insert its own materials.  We only have one template so
far, so we don't need blocks yet.

author: marvin
msg: Undo mods to a grid960 element.
The www.apache.org style.css file modifies an element inherited from the
grid960 system.  Cancel out that mod, restoring consistency to grid960.
Offload the style to a separate CSS class and assign multiple classes to the
DOM elements that require that style.

author: marvin
msg: Stop inheriting CSS for main content section.
